actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide special immigrant status for certain retired officers and employees, and certain children and surviving spouses of officers and employees, of international organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include within the definition of "special immigrant" aliens who have resided continuously in the United States for at least five years prior to applying for immigrant status and who are: (1) unmarried children (aged 16 to 25) of officers or employees of specified international organizations; (2) surviving spouses of such deceased officers and employees; and (3) retired officers or employees of such organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide special immigrant status for certain retired officers and employees, and certain children and surviving spouses of officers and employees, of international organizations.
